verses.name: Lamentations 3:29
verses.text: He putteth his mouth in the dust; if so be there may be hope.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:30
verses.text: He giveth his cheek to him that smiteth him: he is filled full with reproach.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:31
verses.text: For the Lord will not cast off for ever:

verses.name: Lamentations 3:32
verses.text: But though he cause grief, yet will he have compassion according to the multitude of his mercies.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:33
verses.text: For he doth not afflict willingly nor grieve the children of men.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:34
verses.text: To crush under his feet all the prisoners of the earth,

verses.name: Lamentations 3:35
verses.text: To turn aside the right of a man before the face of the most High,
